title: Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect about custom cookie name affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 mentions that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting, but this is not true in the current trunk. Default 'jsessionid' is used instead of the custom cookie name.
OB: Currently, when accessing http://localhost:8080/cookiename/, the URL in the address bar shows 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name. For example: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/;jsessionid=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
EB: Expected result: If the statement in 7.1.1 is to be followed, the URL should show the custom cookie name instead of 'jsessionid'. For example: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Deploy the attached cookiename.war file. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/
